metadata.title: CVE-2021-46853 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Alpine before 2.25 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) when LIST or LSUB is sent before STARTTLS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

alpine - 2.25+dfsg1-1build1
alpine-pico - 2.25+dfsg1-1build1
pilot - 2.25+dfsg1-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: alpine package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.25+dfsg1-1build1').
